cards.title: Breach Mage
powers: Activate a card's Cast text, then destroy that card.
Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, any player draws 5 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero deals 1 target 2 Fire Damage.

cards.title: Cycle of Magic
body: Draw 2 cards. Activate a card's Cast text, then place that card on top of your deck.

cards.title: FocusBreach
body: Draw a card. Search your deck or trash for a Breach and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it. You may play a card.

cards.title: Open Breach
body: At the start of your turn, you may activate a card's Cast text, then destroy that card.
At the end of your turn, you may play 1 Spell card.

cards.title: Potent Breach
body: At the start of your turn, you may activate a card's Cast text, then destroy that card. If that Cast text deals damage, increase that damage by 1.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: Breach Mage deals 1 Target 4 Lightning Damage. Reveal the top 2 cards of any deck. Put them back on top of the deck in any order.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: Breach Mage deals 1 Target 4 Radiant Damage. Each player draws a card.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: Breach Mage deals 1 Target 3 Psychic Damage. You may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: Breach Mage deals 1 Target 3 Fire Damage. You may destroy up to 3 of your Charge cards. For each card destroyed this way, Breach Mage deals 1 Target 3 Fire Damage.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: Breach Mage deals each non-Hero Target 3 Fire Damage.

cards.title: Hammer Charm
cards.body: When you play this, you may destroy an Ongoing or Equipment card.
cards.powers: Return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Staff Charm
cards.body: When you play this, activate a card's Cast text, then destroy that card. If that Cast text deals damage, increase that damage by 2.
cards.powers: Return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Spiral Charm
cards.body: When you play this, activate a card's Cast text.
cards.powers: Return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Vigor Charm
cards.body: When you play this, draw 3 cards and Breach Mage deals themselves 2 Psychic Damage.
cards.powers: Return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Aura Charm
cards.body: When you play this, one Hero may use a power.
cards.powers: Return this card to your hand.

promoCards.title: Breach Mage
powers: Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, select a card and activate its Cast text twice, then destroy that card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero deals 1 target 2 Fire Damage.
